Moretz’s Acting Roles and Their Impact

Moretz’s acting career began at a young age, with her breakout role as Hit-Girl in the 2010 superhero film “Kick-Ass.” This performance propelled her into the spotlight, showcasing her ability to portray complex and powerful characters. Moretz’s subsequent roles in films like “Hugo” (2011), “Carrie” (2013), and “The 5th Wave” (2016) solidified her status as a talented and versatile actress.

Moretz’s diverse filmography encompasses a wide range of genres, including horror, science fiction, drama, and comedy. Her ability to seamlessly transition between these genres has contributed to her enduring appeal and career longevity.
